commits.message: Release v0.3.0 - MapLibre + Vulpes Monthly Theme Line
chore(release): v0.2.1
feat(mcp): add tmux control server with current pane detection
chore: remove stale backup files
docs: update setup guide, remove unwanted plugin index
feat(nvim): workflow improvements, hardtime training, and auto-validation
fix: resolve all production build issues
fix: remove TypeScript annotations breaking production build
docs(tips): add strudel.nvim integration tips
chore: format code with prettier and resolve lint warnings
fix: handle race condition in content copy during hot reload
fix: escape ampersands in sitemap template
perf: optimize CommitMatrix animation performance
feat(skills): add robot‚Üíhuman delegation protocol
feat: animate commit matrix with Perlin noise + boid flocking
feat(mcp): add GitHub and Things MCP servers (3/3 slots)
feat(stats): add 7777px WebGL commit matrix art piece
fix: switch YouTube enrichment to use Gemini 2.5 Flash for speed/cost
feat(mcp): backup obsidian MCP server config for easy restore
feat(on-this-day): add last updated timestamp display
feat(stats): add last updated timestamps to Now and Stats pages
feat(predictions): add last updated timestamp display
feat(seo): add comprehensive structured data and metadata
build(deps): add d3 modules for GitHub data visualizations
feat(github): add repository viewer pages with dynamic routing
feat(github): add repository data export system with GraphQL API
feat(github): add Tuftian data visualizations for repository explorer
refactor(ui): add explicit animation timing to remaining transitions
refactor(ui): remove decorative hover effects, keep utilitarian interactions
feat: add YouTube watch later import and enrichment tools
feat(ui): ghostty shaders, sketchybar status, claude settings
feat(zsh): add mosh auto-install and reconnect helpers
feat(workflow): nvim + claude code integration + bulletproof ssh
refactor: integrate YouTube commands into main CLI
feat: add YouTube playlist generator with Whisper transcription support
docs: add comprehensive documentation to entity graph explorer
fix: comprehensive security audit and improvements
feat: interactive graph explorer with d3-force physics
feat: add GitHub repository viewer at /github/[repo]
fix: entity query matching accuracy and data quality
feat: add entity knowledge graph query command
feat: pin URL to top of summary box
fix: handle undefined relationship fields
feat: include ALL fields in editor view (except embeddings)
feat: include all scrap data in editor view
feat: add 'e' keybinding to open scraps in $EDITOR
fix: prevent docker cache corruption with commit-based cache busting
chore: bump version to 2.0.1
refactor: rename files for clarity
fix: reduce deploy downtime from minutes to ~5 seconds
fix: copy data directory to Docker container
refactor: reorganize repository structure for clarity
docs: remove emoji for clean Unix-style documentation
fix: clear build cache before deployment to prevent corruption
chore: release v2.0.0
feat: power user integrations (fzf, zsh, fish, SketchyBar)
docs: comprehensive README with tested CLI examples
fix: resolve search issues with JSONB and enum columns
feat: add structured output formats for CLI composability
feat: replace search with fzf fuzzy finder
fix: improve search with case-insensitive pattern matching
fix: move h-feed microformat class from @apply to template
fix: resolve linting errors in blog index, TweetCard, and kalshi API
fix: use correct blessed API for scroll reset
refactor: use ScrobbleCard component for consistent card rendering
feat: major UX improvements and vulpes theming
refactor: use @apply for cleaner classes in pages
feat: add script for future github action to check for added blog files and post them
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/ejfox/website
fix(blog): make "read more" button work
12-1-3 only
